mapper.select: select ad.*, adg.groupname from address ad, addressGroup adg where ad.ADGNO = adg.ADGNO and memno=#{memNo} order by adno
select m.*, d.deptname, p.posname from member m, department d, position p where m.deptcode=d.deptcode and m.poscode=p.poscode
select * from department order by deptcode
